pkgmetadata.longdescription: Access and Analyze eBird Status and Trends Data // Tools to download, map, plot and analyze eBird Status and Trends data (https://ebird.org/science/status-and-trends). eBird (https://ebird.org) is a global database of bird observations collected by citizen scientists. eBird Status and Trends uses these data to analyse continental bird abundances, range boundaries, habitats, and trends.
